text: Anna Christie is a 1930 American romantic drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and was based on the 1921 play of the same name by Eugene O'Neill. It stars Greta Garbo, Charles Bickford, George F. Marion, Marie Dressler, Lee Phelps and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1930 and a German-language version was also made in the same year. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown
title: Anna Christie
